text:
Sakuya, sorry for keeping you waiting.
The phone call dragged on────

Ah, Producer.
Are you ready to go?

Yeah, I'm good, but...
Is something the matter?

No, it's just that the children playing over there are
so adorable. They must be really happy to be on a trip.

Ah... that might be true────
I remember when I was a kid,
Just the idea of going on a trip made me so excited.

Producer's childhood...
Heheh, I bet you were adorable.

Haha, who knows... But yeah,
Even now, going on a trip still gets me excited.

I can relate to that.
I'm feeling really excited right now too.
